/** * Title: contact.component.ts * Date: January 12, 2023 * Author: Jamal Eddine Damir * Description: Composer contact component * Sources: * Source code from class GitHub Repository * Instructor provided assignment specific instructions */ // Importing component import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-contact', templateUrl: './contact.component.html', styleUrls: ['./contact.component.css'], }) export class ContactComponent {}
